comment: Caleb is a great! Even though it's a math credit, there's no math honestly it's all learning how to work in Excel. He takes a minute to get grades back to you but he's not a strict grader. Weekly assignments, 1 Midterm, and 1 Final (you're paired with someone based on your grade in the midterm so do well so your partner won't be a headache lol)

Really great professor. He goes over the excel workbook in class to help with the assignments. There is a midterm and final project, it's best to start on them early because there is a lot of work to do. Attendance isn't required but recommended.

This guy is one of the best professors I've had in college so far. He walks you through every Excel assignment in class, and provides very clear rubrics for any and all assignments/homework. He is super lenient and laidback when it comes to any problems you may experience. He's truly great, if you take DATA 1501 be sure you get him as your prof!
Caleb is so nice! I genuinely loved being in his class. Such an interesting guy and I think that he really cares about his students and his subject.

This class isnt hard really if you pay attention, Caleb does each assignment in class with you, and you just submit on D2L. Dont wait too long to start on the midterm and final project and try not to miss any days.
